title: Cool Milk Splashing Font
content:
Typography and food go very well together. [Eat Me Daily](http://web.archive.org/web/20150102213548/http:/www.eatmedaily.com/2009/04/typeface-made-from-splashing-milk/) has a great picture of a typeface made from pictures of splashing milk.

[http://www.eatmedaily.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2009/04/milkfont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150102213548/http:/www.eatmedaily.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2009/04/milkfont.jpg "http://www.eatmedaily.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2009/04/milkfont.jpg")
author: Katherine Sniffen
